Sample Post

Lifting Real->Real->Real to (Real->Real->Real)->(Real->Real->Real)->Real->Real in Nadeko

(:= real^>fn
    op f g x
    (op (f x) (g x)))

(:= f+ (real^>fn +))

(f+ (* 2) (- 1) 5)                                              ;;=> 14
